name: Amethyst Crystal Rings
des: Enhances spiritual awareness and provides a sense of calm. Perfect for stress relief and deep meditation.

name: Carnelian Crystal Rings
des: Boosts motivation, endurance, and leadership qualities. Known for stimulating creativity and courage.

name: Citrine Crystal Rings
des: The stone of manifestation and wealth. Brings solar energy for joy, success, and abundance.

name: Clear Quartz Crystal Rings
des: A master healer that amplifies energy and thought. Improves mental clarity and balances the body.

name: Green Onyx Crystal Rings
des: Promotes purity, restfulness, and relieves stress. Helps in building physical and emotional stamina.

name: Lapis Crystal Rings
des: Promotes wisdom, truth, and intellectual ability. Encourages self-awareness and reveals inner truth.

name: Ruby Crystal Rings
des: Symbolizes passion, protection, and prosperity. Helps in boosting energy levels and confidence.

name: Tiger Eye Crystal Rings
des: A powerful grounding stone that provides courage and protection. Enhances focus and willpower.
